kw.name: Parse Xml
kw.doc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Get Element Text
kw.doc: Returns all text of the element, possibly whitespace normalized.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Element Text
kw.doc: Sets text and/or tail text of the specified element.

kw.name: Save Xml
kw.doc: Saves the given element to the specified file.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${result} = <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <breakfast_menu> <food> <name>Cat Waffels</name> <price>$5.95</price> <description>Two of our famous Belgian Waffles with plenty of r...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <breakfast_menu> <food> <name>Cat Waffels</name> <price>$5.95</price> <description>Two of our famous Belgian Waffles with plenty of real maple syrup</description> <calories>650</calories> </food> <food> <name>Strawberry Belgian Waffles</name> <price>$7.95</price> <description>Light Belgian waffles covered with strawberries and whipped cream</description> <calories>900</calories> </food> <food> <name>Very-Berry Belgian Waffles</name> <price>$8.95</price> <description>Light Belgian waffles covered with an assortment of fresh berries and whipped cream</description> <calories>900</calories> </food> <food> <name>French Toast</name> <price>$4.50</price> <description>Thick slices made from our homemade sourdough bread</description> <calories>600</calories> </food> <food> <name>Homestyle Breakfast</name> <price>$6.95</price> <description>Two eggs, bacon or sausage, toast, and our ever-popular hash browns</description> <calories>950</calories> </food> <food> <name>Grilled Cheese Sandwich</name> <price>$2.95</price> <description>Yummy melted cheese on grilled sourdough slices</description> <calories>300</calories> </food> </breakfast_menu>

kw.name: How to set element text - Another approach
Parse Xml
kw.doc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Get Element Text
kw.doc: Returns all text of the element, possibly whitespace normalized.
kw.msg: ${text} = This is needed to be changed

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: This is needed to be changed

kw.name: Set Element Text
kw.doc: Sets text and/or tail text of the specified element.

kw.name: Save Xml
kw.doc: Saves the given element to the specified file.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${result} = <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <demo> <script /> <script /> <id>123456</id> <heading>Reminder</heading> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> <footer> <some_data>This is just some rando...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <demo> <script /> <script /> <id>123456</id> <heading>Reminder</heading> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> <footer> <some_data>This is just some random data</some_data> <important_data>Changed!!!</important_data> </footer> <superios_data> <important_element data="Change this?" /> </superios_data> <test_tag info="This element tag is going to be changed!" /> </demo>

kw.name: Parse Xml
kw.doc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the named attribute of the specified element.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Element Attribute
kw.doc: Sets attribute ``name`` of the specified element to ``value``.

kw.name: Save Xml
kw.doc: Saves the given element to the specified file.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${result} = <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <demo> <script /> <script /> <id>123456</id> <heading>Reminder</heading> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> <footer> <some_data>This is just some rando...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <demo> <script /> <script /> <id>123456</id> <heading>Reminder</heading> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> <footer> <some_data>This is just some random data</some_data> <important_data>This is needed to be changed</important_data> </footer> <superios_data> <important_element data="!!!*CHANGED*!!!" /> </superios_data> <test_tag info="This element tag is going to be changed!" /> </demo>

kw.name: Parse Xml
kw.doc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.

kw.name: Set Element Tag
kw.doc: Sets the tag of the specified element.

kw.name: Save Xml
kw.doc: Saves the given element to the specified file.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${result} = <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <demo> <script /> <script /> <id>123456</id> <heading>Reminder</heading> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> <footer> <some_data>This is just some rando...
